props.name: gap
props.description: Specify the gap between children elements in the stack.

props.name: direction
props.description: Specify the orientation for the stack container.

props.name: align
props.description: Specify the alignment between items in the cross-axis of the orientation.

props.name: wrap
props.description: Specify whether items are forced onto one line or can wrap onto multiple lines.

props.name: justify
props.description: Specify how items will be distributed in the stacking direction.

props.name: padding
props.description: Specify the padding of the stack container.

props.name: grow
props.description: Allow item to keep size or expand to fill the available space.

props.name: shrink
props.description: Allow item to keep size or shrink to fit the available space.
